text: Aldair Cravid D´Almeida (born 9 September 1989), commonly known as Primo, is a São Toméan footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Sporting Praia Cruz and the São Tomé and Príncipe national team. ==International career== Primo made his international debut for São Tomé and Príncipe in 2017. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe footballers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe international footballers Category:Sporting Praia Cruz players
title: Primo (footballer)
